page.title: 02THE SCHOOL-GENERAL DESCRIP.
page.content: The school is a small village primary school. As of 01/09/85, there are only 24 pupils on roll. The pupils range in age from 4 years to 11 years. The are 10 Infants (3 boys and 7 girls), and 14 Juniors (7 of each sex). There are but two teachers,- the Headteacher (male) and an assistant teacher (female). The latter is responsible for the Infant class. There is a kitchen attached to the school, and meals are prepared on the premises. The Cook is helped a kitchen assistant. Another woman supervises the children during the lunch hour. There are 3 classrooms;- two in the old block and one in the new block.
